name: Are NFTs real?
description:
This is my epic submission for the 2022.1 Brackeys Game Jam. 

Watch how I made this game here: 

I didnt have a lot of time to work on it, so I just made this especially small game making fun of the present NFT culture. I get that the topic is a lot more complex than just "they have no real value", since the technology may have some uses, but the current prominent practices involving them are clearly a lot more harmful than useful. 

Idea is heavily inspired by Robert Thomson's game Type-Pose:

 Type-Pose by brotherst (itch.io)

I Made My Subscribers' Game Ideas! - YouTube
